reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 23/22: TEMPORARY SUSPENSION OF STATUTORY PROTECTIONS FOR BLACK ASH
reg_info.reg_name_text: TEMPORARY SUSPENSION OF STATUTORY PROTECTIONS FOR BLACK ASH

content.content: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to the classification of black ash (Fraxinus nigra) as an endangered species in the annual report submitted by COSSARO to the Minister on January 27, 2021.
content.raw_html: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to the classification of black ash (Fraxinus nigra) as an endangered species in the annual report submitted by COSSARO to the Minister on January 27, 2021.

content.content: 2. Despite any amendment to Ontario Regulation 230/08 (Species at Risk in Ontario List), made under the Act, listing black ash as an endangered species, the prohibitions in subsections 9 (1) and 10 (1) of the Act do not apply with respect to black ash for the period that begins on January 26, 2022 and ends on January 25, 2024.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite any amendment to Ontario Regulation 230/08 (Species at Risk in Ontario List), made under the Act, listing black ash as an endangered species, the prohibitions in subsections 9 (1) and 10 (1) of the Act do not apply with respect to black ash for the period that begins on January 26, 2022 and ends on January 25, 2024.

content.content: 3. The reason for the temporary suspension described in section 2 is that, without such a suspension, the application of the prohibitions in subsections 9 (1) and 10 (1) of the Act with respect to black ash would likely have significant social and economic implications for many parts of Ontario, and, as a result, additional time is required to determine the best approach to protecting black ash and its habitat. Note: Section 4 comes into force on January 26, 2024. Revocation 4. This Regulation is revoked.
content.raw_html:
3. The reason for the temporary suspension described in section 2 is that, without such a suspension, the application of the prohibitions in subsections 9 (1) and 10 (1) of the Act with respect to black ash would likely have significant social and economic implications for many parts of Ontario, and, as a result, additional time is required to determine the best approach to protecting black ash and its habitat.

Note: Section 4 comes into force on January 26, 2024.

Revocation

4. This Regulation is revoked.

content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).   Français
